short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: הצג את ספירת העומר היומית בדפדפן

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Displays the daily Omer count conveniently in your browser window. 
Sefirat HaOmer, the traditional Jewish practice of counting the 49 days between Passover and Shavuot, becomes easier to observe with this convenient reminder.
